mapper.sql: LTId, Year, Place, LaCode, LaName, LaTax
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_largetax where year = #{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_largetax
LTId,
Year,
Place,
LaCode,
LaName,
LaTax,
#{ltid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update tbl_largetax
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LaCode = #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LaName = #{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LaTax = #{latax,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where LTId = #{ltid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_largetax set Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LaCode = #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LaName = #{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LaTax = #{latax,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where LTId = #{ltid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
